FuncDef:
The access four-dimensional mode enable command configures the device to interwork with an external device in four-dimensional mode.
The undo access four-dimensional mode enable command restores the default configuration.
By default, the device interworks with an external device in three-dimensional mode.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
By default, the device exchanges interface information (such as option82 and Nas-port-id) with a DHCP or RADIUS server in three-dimensional mode. To enable the device to interwork with a DHCP or RADIUS server in four-dimensional mode, run the access four-dimensional mode enable command.
The access four-dimensional mode enable command takes effect only for new login users.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
